pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Tribute to Yip Harburg on the Jonathan Schwartz radio program
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Jonathan Schwartz talks about the life and career of American lyricist Yip Harburg, and plays recordings of various songs written by Yip Harburg as a tribute to him. Includes compilation of the excerpts from various intherviews with Harburg, and comments by Stephen Sondheim. Jonathan Schwartz and Stephen Sondheim read fragments from Harburg's lyrics.
